scripts.phpunit: wp-env start && wp-env run --env-cwd="wp-content/plugins/vk-css-optimize" tests-wordpress vendor/bin/phpunit -c .phpunit.xml.dist --verbose
scripts.phpunit2: composer install && npx wp-env run --env-cwd="wp-content/plugins/vk-css-optimize" tests-wordpress /vendor/bin/phpunit -c .phpunit.xml.dist --verbose
scripts.phpunit3: composer install && npx wp-env run phpunit "phpunit -c /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/vk-css-optimize/.phpunit.xml.dist --verbose"
